title: Boeing, Palantir collaborate on AI for defense, space and security
description: U.S. defense, space and security will benefit from Boeing's use of Palantir's artificial intelligence-based Foundry platform to streamline its major production lines, officials said Tuesday.
content:
Sept. 23 (UPI) -- U.S. defense, space and security will benefit from Boeing's use of Palantir's artificial intelligence-based Foundry platform to streamline its major production lines, officials said Tuesday.

title: Meta's Llama to be made available to US allies in Europe, Asia
description: Allies of the United States in Europe and Asia will now have access to Meta Platforms' artificial intelligence system Llama, the company said on Tuesday, a day after the U.S. approved its use for government agencies.
content:
Llama is a large language model capable of processing data, including text, video, images and audio.
Sign up here.
The social media giant is now expanding access to a number of U.S. democratic allies in Europe and Asia: France, Germany, Italy, Japan ... [621 chars]

title: Stargate project announces 5 new AI data centers across US states
description: OpenAI, Oracle and SoftBank announced five new artificial intelligence data center sites for the $500 billion Stargate project, bringing total investment to over $400 billion.
content: The $500 billion Stargate project with the aim of giving the U.S. an edge in the artificial intelligence (AI) race is moving forward following the announcement of five new AI data center sites revealed on Tuesday by the companies investing in the pro... [3822 chars]

title: FBI arrests Oakland County man in artificial intelligence nude cyberstalking, extortion case
description: Neighbors said they watched as federal agents, with weapons and shields drawn, forced their way into a Commerce Township home to arrest a man now charged in a federal cyberstalking and extortion case.
content:

title: OpenAI and Oracle Show off Stargate AI Data Center in Texas and Plan Five More Elsewhere
description: ABILENE, Texas (AP) — The afternoon sun was so hot that OpenAI CEO Sam Altman traded his usual sweater for a T-shirt on the last legs of a Tuesday visit to the massive Stargate artificial intelligence data center complex that will power the future of ChatGPT.

title: OpenAI, Oracle, SoftBank plan five new AI data centers for $500 billion Stargate project
description: OpenAI, Oracle and SoftBank on Tuesday announced plans for five new artificial intelligence data centers in the United States to build out their ambitious Stargate project.
content:
U.S. President Donald Trump in January hosted top tech CEOs to launch Stargate, a private-sector initiative that plans to spend up to $500 billion to build AI infrastructure.
Sign up here.

title: OpenAI Expands Stargate With Five New Data Center Sites Across US
description: OpenAI plans to invest roughly $400 billion to develop five new US data center sites in partnership with Oracle Corp. and SoftBank Group Corp., marking the biggest push yet to fulfill an earlier pledge to spend a half-trillion dollars on artificial intelligence infrastructure in the country.The new locations, spread across Texas, New Mexico and Ohio, will eventually have a capacity of 7 gigawatts of power, or as much as some cities, the companies said Tuesday.
